title: Fragment Of Medallion, 6th–7th century
medium:
Medium: Warp: tightly z-spun linen, Weft: s-twist linen, s-twist wool
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary wrapping.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18.2 x 19.3 cm (7 3/16 x 7 5/8 in.)
description: Multi-colored fragment partially depicts two figures and a horse on a red ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment Of Medallion, 6th–7th century.
6th–7th century. Medium: Warp: tightly z-spun linen, Weft: s-twist linen, s-twist wool
Technique: slit tapestry woven with supplementary wrapping.. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-13.
